134407.「この宮殿の中でのみ 使うことができる\n 封印の聖灰を取り扱っています。\n:
My task is to handle the Sealing Ash, which
can only be used inside this palace.
What is it I can do for you?
<break>

134421.「封印の聖灰を <%nL_POINT_NUM>個使って\n <%sL_SEAL_:
You wish to use <%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash to seal the
<%sL_SEAL_KOUKA> effect?<yesno 1><break>

134422.「封印の聖灰を <%nL_POINT_NUM>個使って\n 戦神のベルトにつく効:
It will cost <%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash to seal another
possible belt effect. Please choose the effect
you wish to seal.
<break>

134423.「すでに 戦神のベルトにつく効果を\n 最大まで 封印しています。\n<brea:
You've already sealed the maximum amount
of effects possible.
<break>

134424.「この効果は すでに封印されています。\n<bw_break>:
This effect has already been sealed.
<bw_break>

134425.「これ以上 戦神のベルトにつく効果を\n 封印することは できません。\n<bw:
I can't seal off the effects of the War God's
belt any longer...<bw_break>

134426.「封印の聖灰が 足りません。\n<bw_break>:
You don't have enough Sealing Ash.
<bw_break>

134429.「それでは 戦神のベルトの効果の\n 封印状態をリセットします。\n<br>\n:
To reset all of your sealed effects, I will require <%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash.
In addition, the <%dL_GET_NUM> Sealing Ash you've used so far will be returned do you. Do you want to reset them?

134430.「それでは 戦神のベルトの効果の\n 封印状態を リセットします。\n<br>\:
Let's reset the seal on the effects of the War God's Belt. I'll use <%nL_POINT_NUM> of holy ashes for sealing, but the <%nL_GET_NUM>
I've used for sealing so far will be returned... You can only have <%nL_MAX_NUM> ashes for sealing... If I reset it now, it
will only hold <%nL_GET_NUM2> more ashes, is that okay?

134431.「戦神のベルトの効果を 封印していません。\n<bw_break>:
I've sealed the effects of the War God's
belt...<bw_break>

134432.「封印の聖灰を <%nL_POINT_NUM>個 使って\n 戦神のベルトの効果:
I'll use <%nL_POINT_NUM> of the Holy Ashes of the Seal to reset the sealed state of the War God's Belt's effect... The <%nL_GET_NUM> of
holy ashes you've used so far will be returned.

134848.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>を 捧げると\n 封印の聖灰が<:
If you offer that <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>, you
will get <%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash. The offered item will
be lost. Are you certain?
<yesno 2><break>

134849.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n 今 装備しているものです:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is currently
equipped. Are you sure you want to offer it?
<yesno 2><break>

134850.「今持っている封印の聖灰は <%nL_TOTAL_NUM>個です。\n 封印の聖:
You currently have <%dL_TOTAL_NUM> Sealing Ash.
I can give you more, but only if you offer an
item to me. Which one will you offer?
<break>

134851.「封印の聖灰は <%nL_MAX_NUM>個までしか持てません。\n 今 <%s:
You can only hold <%nL_MAX_NUM> of the Holy Ashes of the Seal... If I give <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> now, it will only
increase by <%nL_GET_NUM>, is that correct?

134853.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n ロックされていますので\:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is locked, so you
cannot offer it.
<bw_break>

134854.「残念ですが 封印の聖灰に変えられる\n アイテムをお持ちではないようです。\n:
I'm afraid I don't have any items that can be
turned into holy ashes for sealing.<bw_break>

134855.「これ以上 封印の聖灰を\n 増やすことは できません。\n<bw_break>:
I can't have any more of those sealed
ashes...<bw_break>

139206.「封印の聖灰は 『封印の聖灰を増やす』を\n 選んで 特定のアクセサリーを捧げる:
The Holy Ashes of the Seal can be obtained by selecting "Increase Holy Ashes of the Seal" and offering a specific accessory. With the
Holy Ashes of the Seal, you can choose up to 50 of the various effects on the War God's Belt to seal. The sealed effects will not
appear on any subsequent War God Belts you acquire. If you want to undo a sealed effect, you can use the "Reset Sealed Effects" option
to reset all previous settings. You'll need 50 sealed ashes to reset. In exchange, you'll get back the ashes you've used to seal it.

158873.「<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>を捧げて <%sL_ITEM>の効果を\n:
You can offer a <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> to strengthen
the effects of your <%sL_ITEM>. You
currently have <%dL_KYOUKA_NUM> <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>.
<break>

158875.「他に どの<%sL_ITEM>を 強化しますか？\n 現在 <%sL_KYOU:
Are there any other <%sL_ITEM> that
you wish to enhance?
You currently have <%dL_KYOUKA_NUM> <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>.
<break>

158877.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は ロックされています。\n 強:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is locked. Are you
sure you want to strengthen it?<yesno 2><break>

158879.「ベルトの強化に 失敗しました……。\n はじめから もう一度 お試しください。:
I've failed to strengthen the belt. Please
try again from the beginning...<bw_break>

158881.「<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>を 持っていません。\n <%sL_KYOU:
I have a <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>... You can get
<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> from the reward chests in
the Palace of the Evil Gods...<bw_break>

158883.「<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>と 強化できる\n <%sL_ITEM>を:
I have <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> and <%sL_ITEM> that can be enhanced... <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> can be obtained from the treasure chest in the
Palace of the Evil Gods...

158885.「強化できる <%sL_ITEM>を\n 持っていません。\n<bw_break: We have a <%sL_ITEM> that can be enhanced...<bw_break>

158887.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n これ以上 強化することは:
That <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> cannot be enhanced
any further.<bw_break>

158889.<pc>は <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>と\n<%sL_KYO:
<pc> offered the <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> and
<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>!
Sealing Ash effect has been triggered!
<bw_break>

158890.おや……？ なんと <%sL_ITEM>が\n強い光を放ちはじめた……！\n<b:
Oh...? Oh my god, <%sL_ITEM> is starting to
glow strongly...!<bw_break>

158892.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>に 新たな効果がめざめ\n<%sL:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> has awakened a new effect: <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>!
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is now <%sL_ITEM><%sL_RESLT_PLUSNUM>!

158893.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>と\n <%sL_KYOUKA_:
Do you want to offer the
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> and
<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>?<yesno><break>
